title: BOSCH Clear Advantage 26CA Beam Wiper Blade - 26" (Single)
description: Bosch Clear Advantage Wiper Blades feature a patented beam design that reduces exposed metal for greater resistance to ice and snow build-up for improved all-weather performance. The blended natural rubber blade, with graphite treated wiping edge, reduces friction for a quiet and smooth wipe in all seasons. Clear Advantage wiper blades include an aerodynamic wind spoiler that creates downward force which ensures superior windshield contact for consistent wiping at higher speeds. The versatile Click-On adapter system - compatible with most vehicles - ensures quick and easy installation. Included adapters fit: 9x3mm Hook, 9x4mm Hook, 4.8mm (3/16 inch) Small Pin, 6.35mm (1/4 inch) Large Pin, Side Lock, 16mm Narrow Top Lock (select lengths only), 19mm Large Top Lock, BMW Top Lock, Pinch Tab.
